# nextIteration()

**Instance Method**

Advances the visualization stream to the next iteration.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func nextIteration()
```

## Seeing the next visualization

- **hasFinishedStreaming**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the stream has provided its final iteration.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the stream has provided its final iteration.
